title: Combined SPECT and cardiac MR imaging can help guide ventricular tachycardia ablation

title_detail.value: Combined SPECT and cardiac MR imaging can help guide ventricular tachycardia ablation

summary: Adding functional imaging to structural imaging of patients with ventricular tachycardia (VT) has the potential to improve current VT ablation strategies, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Adding functional imaging to structural imaging of patients with ventricular tachycardia (VT) has the potential to improve current VT ablation strategies, according to new research.
